title: 10 Pairs Women Winter Gloves Touchscreen Warm Gloves Fleece Knitted Gloves Full Finger Thermal Gloves for Women Girl Cycling Hiking Skiing
features: 5 Colors to Choose: the package includes 10 pairs of warm gloves for women in 5 classic colors, including black, gray, red, pink and beige, 2 pairs for each color, sufficient to wear and replace, providing you with a wide choice to match your coats, down jackets, sweaters, hoodies and so on

One Size Fits Most: the texting gloves measure about 8.66 inches/ 22 cm long, and 4 inches/ 10 cm in width at the wrist part, suitable for most women and girls, with nice elasticity, can provide you with a snug fit, without being too tight or loose

Touchscreen Design: designed with conductive fabric on thumb and index finger tips, these gloves with touchscreen fingers allow you to text on the screen, or take a call, no need to take off gloves in the cold weather

Comfortable Material: the winter gloves for women are made of quality acrylic fibers, featuring soft and warm lining, strong and reliable, not easy to fade, wear or tear, can keep your hands warm and comfy, and will not influence your fingers' flexibility

Practical and Versatile: the mittens for women are suitable for jogging, shopping, hiking, climbing, fishing, cycling, walking dogs, going to school, gardening, skiing, skating, snowboarding, football, basketball, tennis and so on, so you can fully enjoy the fun of outdoor activities this cold season
description: Features: The cold weather gloves are designed with an elastic ribbed cuff, which can keep gloves close to your skin, and efficiently block chilly wind and cold air from entering. You can send knit gloves to your friends, colleagues, classmates, relatives, neighbors and family members, to bring them warmth in cold winter, and enhance your relationship.  Specifications: Material: acrylic fibers Color: black, gray, red, pink, beige Size: about 8.66 inches/ 22 cm long, and 4 inches/ 10 cm in width at the wrist part  Package includes: 10 Pairs of winter gloves for women  Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.
